titleStmt.title: The sonne of Gods entertainment by the sonnes of men Set forth in a sermon at Paules Crosse the seauenth of October. 1604. By Richard Iefferay of Magdalen Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Jefferay, Richard, b. 1567.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.P[urfoot] for Henrie Tomes, and are to be sold at his shop at Graies Inne new gate in Holborne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.

place.placeName: his shop at Graies Inne new gate in Holborne
